title: Self-Supervised Graph Transformer for Deepfake Detection
venue: IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR)
abstract: A novel approach using spatial-temporal graph reasoning to identify sophisticated AI-generated facial manipulations.

title: Privacy-Preserving DNS Protocols for IoT Ecosystems
venue: Journal of Network and Computer Applications
abstract: Analyzing the trade-offs between latency and encryption in DNS-over-HTTPS (DoH) for edge devices.
